intro: Hide, survive, and outsmart terrifying creatures in a deadly hunt.
description:
As a lone survivor aboard this forsaken vessel, your only hope for escape lies in completing a series of perilous objectives that will unlock the path back to Earth. But beware, for you are not alone. Cosmic alien creatures, driven by insatiable hunger and unyielding hostility, stalk the planets with deadly intent.

In Lethal Cosmic Hunt, every shadow conceals a potential threat, and every creaking sound could herald your doom. To survive, you must rely on your wits and cunning, using stealth and subterfuge to evade the clutches of your pursuers. Hide in the shadows, sneak past patrolling monstrosities, and pray that your nerve holds out against the relentless onslaught of terror.

Can you survie?
